A self-described "trophy husband" stays at home while his three wives go out and work full-time jobs.

articles.title: Coronation Street fans 'work out' how Carla Connor will expose killer Stephen - Express
articles.description: Coronation Street fans are certain Carla Connor will be the one to expose Stephen Reid after he spiked her drink.

articles.title: Sir Jackie Stewart offers to talk to Bruce Willis' family about dementia - Daily Record
articles.description: Jackie's wife Helen, 82, has had the illness since 2014, and has lost the ability to walk.
articles.content:
Motor racing legend Sir Jackie Stewart, whose wife Helen has dementia, has offered to talk to Bruce Willis and his family as he understands exactly what they are going through.
